title: Porto Novo
body: A small village at the mouth of the river of the same name and part of the parish of Gaula, which is a stopping point for steamers traveling to the eastern coast of the island. There is a landing place there built by the General Assembly, the construction of which was completed in 1908.

Porto Novo: A small village at the mouth of the river of the same name and part of the parish of Gaula, which is a stopping point for steamers traveling to the eastern coast of the island. There is a landing place there built by the General Assembly, the construction of which was completed in 1908.
